      • asArgs

public static Object[] asArgs(@Nullable
                                       Object... args)
        Returns the specified objects as an array of arguments.

        the array.

      • boxingClass

        @NotNull
public static Class<?> boxingClass(@NotNull
                                            Class<?> type)
        Returns the class boxing the specified primitive type.

        If the passed class does not represent a primitive type the same class is returned.

        Parameters:
        type - the primitive type.
        Returns:
        the boxing class.

      • cloneArgs

        @NotNull
public static Object[] cloneArgs(@Nullable
                                          Object... args)
        Returns a clone of the specified array of argument objects.
        The cloning is safe, that is, if null is passed, an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        args - the argument objects.
        Returns:
        the array.

      • findConstructor

        @NotNull
public static <TYPE> Constructor<TYPE> findConstructor(@NotNull
                                                                Class<TYPE> type,
                                                                @NotNull
                                                                Object... args)
        Finds the constructor of the specified class best matching the passed arguments.

        Note that clashing of signature is automatically avoided, since constructors are not identified by their name. Hence the best match will always be unique in the class.

        Type Parameters:
        TYPE - the target type.
        Parameters:
        type - the target class.
        args - the constructor arguments.
        Returns:
        the best matching constructor.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no constructor taking the specified objects as parameters was found.

      • findMethod

        @NotNull
public static Method findMethod(@NotNull
                                         Class<?> type,
                                         @NotNull
                                         String name,
                                         @NotNull
                                         Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Finds the method matching the specified parameters.

        Note that the returned method may not be accessible.

        Parameters:
        type - the target class.
        name - the method name.
        parameterTypes - the method parameter types.
        Returns:
        the matching method.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no method matching the specified parameters was found.

      • hasStaticScope

        public static boolean hasStaticScope(@NotNull
                                     Class<?> type)
        Checks if the specified class is static or is a top level class.
        Parameters:
        type - the class.
        Returns:
        whether the class has a static scope.

      • hasStaticScope

        public static boolean hasStaticScope(@NotNull
                                     Object instance)
        Checks if the class of the specified instance is static or is a top level class.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance.
        Returns:
        whether the instance has a static scope.
